settings.desc: Delivering exceptional skincare solutions that nourish, rejuvenate, and elevate your skin health to new heights.

settings.title: Pseudoalteromonas
settings.description: Derived from the cold Antarctic ocean, this powerful ingredient fights against extreme weather, signs of aging, and dryness with its marine-rich and natural bioactive properties.

settings.title: Neotive Jellyfish
settings.description: A collagen-rich protein enriched with essential micronutrients that effectively rejuvenates skin elasticity and delivers exceptional hydration.

settings.title: Kombuchka
settings.description: An organic probiotic extracted from fermented tea, enhancing skin's glow, refining texture, and restoring density.

settings.title: Trace Minerals
settings.description: Skin-benefiting trace minerals (zinc, copper, magnesium, manganese) that combat signs of aging, enhance skin tone, and improve texture.

settings.cs-desc: Inspired by the Healing Magic of the Oceans. Dive into the freshest, purest, and deepest waters to unlock the power of ocean-sourced ingredients.

settings.title: 9 Peptides
settings.description: Advanced active ingredients that deeply penetrate the skin, offering anti-aging, brightening, smoothing, and refining effects. Enhances firmness and accelerates skin recovery.

settings.title: Ceramide 3
settings.description: Forms a protective shield to prevent moisture loss and maintain skin's barrier function, combating dryness and irritation while shielding against environmental stressors.

settings.title: Squalane
settings.description: Sourced from olives, Squalane nourishes and softens the skin, enhances elasticity, prevents moisture loss, and indulges the skin with a luxurious feel.

settings.title: Rosa Damascena Flower Oil
settings.description: Strengthens the skin's immune function, enhances natural moisturization, and effectively balances the endocrine system. Ideal for mature, dry, and sensitive skin.

settings.title: EGF
settings.description: A reparative compound that activates cellular processes, promoting collagen and elastin production, diminishing dark spots, reducing under-eye puffiness, and combating the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

settings.cs-desc: An unrivaled line of corrective, protective and replenishing skincare treatments that help to recover your skin, encourage collagen synthesis, restore skin radiance and other superior protection from environmental aggressors.

settings.title: Gentle Cleansing for Radiant Skin
settings.description: Experience our luxurious 3-in-1 cleanser. Effortlessly removes oil, impurities, and makeup. Enriched with rejuvenating jellyfish extract and soothing allantoin. Leaves your skin irresistibly soft, nourished, and beautifully balanced.

settings.title: Moisturizing and hydrating
settings.description: Shield your skin with our potent blend of Pseudomonas aeruginosa extract, collagen, hyaluronic acid, and trace minerals. PH-balancing and combatting dryness, dullness, inflammation, congestion, and fine lines.

settings.title: Anti-aging and Wrinkle  Reduction
settings.description: Elevate your skincare with our unique formula. Enriched with peptides, EGF, collagen, and ceramides, it smooths lines, restores radiance, and protects your skin. Maintain optimal moisture, even for delicate eyes.

settings.title: Soothing and Repairing
settings.description: Revive your skin with our moisturizers and peptides. Boost collagen, shrink pores, and leave no sticky feel. Marine-rich Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract and nutrient-packed ingredients protect against dryness and texture problems. Experience instant radiance, plumpness, and dewy skin.

settings.hopw-desc: Explore the science behind your skin's transformation and elevate your beauty ritual with Miraco Beauty

settings.cmp-rst-desc: Witness the stunning transformations achieved by our skincare formulations. Realize the potential of your skin's transformation and embark on a journey where the mirror reflects the radiant beauty you deserve.

settings.title: What Skin Types Are Your Products Suitable For?
settings.answer:
MIRACO Beauty is formulated with all skin types in mind, even sensitive. However, we understand that some people may have allergies to even natural ingredients therefore, we suggest checking our ingredient labels. As a rule of thumb, we recommend doing a patch test with any products before using them.

If pregnant or breastfeeding, we recommend consulting with your doctor. Although we don't formulate with retinol, we use active ingredients (AHAs and BHAs in the S-Cell Super Cream). We include the full list of ingredients on every product page for full transparency.

If further assistance is needed, do not hesitate to email any questions to inquiry@miracobeauty.com
